AIL.JO.summary: African Rainbow Capital Investments Limited, an investment holding company, invests in a portfolio of listed and unlisted investments. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in EbÃ¨ne, Mauritius.

ARA.JO.summary: Astoria Investments Ltd focuses on investing in equity-dominated holdings of primarily direct listed businesses that are located primarily in developed markets. It intends to invest in equity securities, unlisted or over-the-counter equity securities, other instruments derived from such securities, and direct investment in listed or unlisted businesses. Astoria Investments Ltd has investments in the United States, Europe, the United Kingdom, Asia, South Africa, Australia, and Mauritius. The company was formerly known as Sofrica Holdings Ltd. Astoria Investments Ltd was founded in 2015 and is based in Grand Baie, the Republic of Mauritius. As of October 30, 2019, Astoria Investments Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Livingstone Investments Pty Ltd.

EPE.JO.summary: EPE Capital Partners Ltd, an investment holding company, invests in a portfolio of unlisted private equity-type investments. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Ebene, Mauritius.

UPL.JO.summary: Universal Partners Limited, a capital investment holding company, holds investments in growth businesses in Europe, primarily in the United Kingdom. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Grand Baie, Mauritius.
